brief_title: Study of an Approved Drug in Patients With Asthma (0476-289)(COMPLETED)
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of an approved drug on asthma symptoms in patients with chronic asthma which is also active during the allergy season.
intervention_name: MK0476, montelukast sodium / Duration of Treatment: 4 weeks
Comparator: placebo / Duration of Treatment: 4 weeks
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Asthma symptoms brought on by allergies Exclusion Criteria: - Patient has any lung disease - Currently have a sinus infection or cold symptoms
